title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Lodging              Lodging       There are numerous options for hotel accomodations in Greensboro. Click here to get started.  Â    Want to stay in a restored 18th century town? The Augustus T. Zevely Inn, on the National Historic Register, is located in Old Salem, a living 18th century restored Moravian town (approximately 35 minutes from the Guilford Courthouse battlefield in Winston-Salem, NC). Click here for information.
